DOC.brief_summary: The investigator primary hypothesis recipient Motivational Interviewing intervention would significantly likely assign Psychoeducation intervention demonstrate increase readiness quit smoke end intervention seek smoking cessation treatment one month period follow intervention . We also predict Psychoeducation intervention would result great improvement smoke knowledge .
DOC.brief_title: Motivational Interviewing Compared Psychoeducation Smoking Precontemplators With SMI
DOC.criteria: 1865 year age Had diagnosis schizophrenia , schizoaffective disorder , bipolar disorder , chronic major depressive disorder Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , Fourth Edition criterion Smoked least 10 cigarette per day At baseline , report ready quit smoking within next 30 day ( i.e. , precontemplation contemplation stage ) .
